== Kodakara (627898) ==

Kodakara is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 2129 hectares and harbouring 8179 households with total population of 32201 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 15473 and female population is 16728. Scheduled Caste Population is 3896 and Scheduled Tribes population is 30. Census Location Code of the village is 627898<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
